quotes.quote: Yes, cannabis is dangerous, but no more than other perfectly legal drugs. It's time for a rethink, and the Tory party - the funkiest, most jiving party on Earth - is where it's happening.
quotes.subject: Boris Johnson on cannabis

quotes.quote: My policy on cake is pro having it and pro eating it.
quotes.subject: Boris Johnson on eating cake

quotes.quote: There is absolutely no one, apart from yourself, who can prevent you, in the middle of the night, from sneaking down to tidy up the edges of that hunk of cheese at the back of the fridge.
quotes.subject: Boris Johnson on late night cheese

quotes.quote: My chances of being PM are about as good as the chances of finding Elvis on Mars, or my being reincarnated as an olive.
quotes.subject: Boris Johnson on becoming PM
